about_the_game:
One or two players. Use a mouse or trackpad, keyboard (including Touch Bar), or 1-2 game controllers.

“Celtreos” is like the space shooters of decades past: tiny ship, big weapons, waves of foes, power-ups and obstacles.

Music, Sound and Voice

  • Several different songs in demo (full game has 30 songs and over 45 minutes of music!)

  • You can even play your own music and auto-next-song for key game events

Stages

  • 3 stages in demo (full game has over 12 stages, including a space station, ocean and more)

  • Horizontal scrolling but more than one “screen” of vertical space

  • Start from any stage you want!

  • Each stage ends with a challenging boss

  • Spawn patterns are partially randomized

Weapon Arrays, Special Moves, Power-Ups and More

  • Choose from a huge arsenal of weapons and special abilities

  • 7 different ships to choose from

  • Customize ship properties, such as gun mount locations and top speed

  • In-game power-ups with weapons, defenses and temporary powers (like Rapid Fire)

  • Power-down orbs with temporary inconveniences (like Weapon Freeze)

Additional Configuration Options

  • Set number of lives, and number of times that special abilities can be used

  • Play in a window or in Full Screen, and specify how much of the display to use in Full Screen

  • Set graphics quality to one of three levels

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5 or Apple Silicon Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB or Apple Silicon
  • Storage: 107 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: On macOS 11.0+ can use Xbox or DualShock (PS4) game controllers; on macOS 11.3+ can use DualSense (PS5) controllers; can use MFi controllers on any Mac. External music control implemented only for OS Music app (or iTunes on 10.14 or earlier).
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 15.0
  • Processor: Apple Silicon Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon
  • Storage: 107 MB available space

name: Celtreos Demo
short_description: Free demo! 1-2 players, game controller support. Great music! Tons of weapons, guards & special moves. 3-stage demo (more than 12 in full game), partly-random, with bosses. Play in a window or in Full Screen.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
